metadata.title: CVE-2024-32658 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol. FreeRDPbased clients prior to version 3.5.1 are vulnerable to out-of-bounds read.Version 3.5.1 contains a patch for the issue. No known workarounds areavailable.

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
